text: Nana Mansinh Chudasama (17 June 1933 â€“ 23 December 2018) was an Indian jurist and politician. He was the Mayor and Sheriff of Mumbai from 1989 to 1990. He was the founder of the NGO Giants International which has over 500 branches in India and branches across the world including the United States, United Kingdom, South Africa, Mauritius and Ukraine. He died 23 December 2018, in Mumbai at the age of 86 after a brief illness. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Mumbai
title: Nana Chudasama
